resources.string: AR Music Kit
Playing Guitar
Playing Piano
Playing Music Box
Tracing Markers
About
Cut a guitar out of cardboard
Place sticky notes on guitar. Make sure to include guitar icon
Position phone so camera sees you holding guitar
Move hand over guitar icon to play sound
Place sticky notes on a flat surface
Hold phone over sticky notes. Use hand to cover sticky notes to play sound
Place sticky notes on a flat surface
Hold phone over sticky notes
Move phone across sticky notes to play sound
Make music using sticky notes and your phone\'s camera
Place sticky note over the phone\'s screen. \nIncrease brightness for easier tracing
Carefully trace the outline of marker
To get the markers, you can:
Trace codes onto sticky notes
Save a PDF to your device to print
Email a PDF to yourself to print
This application uses AR TOOL KIT.\nAR TOOL KIT is provided under GPLv3 and LGPLv3.
https://github.com/pol-alok/AR-MUSIC-KIT
